Package assignment02

package assignment02
  • Class
    Description
    Assignment02
    The Assignment02 class simulates the GUI
    Colors
    The Colors enum defines each color Red, Blue, Green, Yellow, Orange, Purple
    GMenu
    The GMenu class is the menu window that opens the game based on the options
    Model
    The Model class defines the rubiks cube
    MyFrame
    The MyFrame class defines the size and exit on each window
    Window
    The Window class simulates the 2d Rubiks cube game
